name: Rock vs. Bus
description:
WASD to move. Avoid the rocks and try not to crash. Credit to V I B E motivation for music. 

if you beat 2000, you are a kid inside the bus. if you beat 3000, you are the bus driver. If you beat 4000, you are the rock. If you beat 5000, you are the bus. If you beat 6000, you are a god. if you beat 10000 you are bus god the almighty.
